uvi.description:
mac80211: remove warning in ieee80211_get_sband()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.47 by commit 8cfe765afd5a8d127770780f45fd971a28897484. For more details please see the references link.
